alert.note: Alert for Ransom; Richland; Sargent (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 9:20PM CDT until August 05 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Ransom County in southeastern North Dakota... Northern Richland County in southeastern North Dakota... Northeastern Sargent County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 920 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gwinner, or 46 miles west of Wahpeton, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Milnor around 930 PM CDT. De Lamere and Hamlin around 935 PM CDT. McLeod around 940 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Wyndmere and Barney. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 19 and 33. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
